docs.title: Welcome to AHO Open Source
docs.text:
Let us spread the open design philosophy to the people of AHO! Let us

  • Show the possibilities of open source
  • Teach how to use open source
  • Increase our knowledge of open source
  • Contribute to open source

Here you will find information and a curated set of tools and assets suitable for studies and work at AHO.

  • #music #daw
  • #cad #3d
  • #cad #3d #rendering
  • #cad #3d #architecture
  • #graphics
  • #video
  • #graphics
  • #cad #2d
  • #music #daw
  • #music #dj
  • #video #vfx
  • #data-analysis
  • #data-visualization

De fleste på AHO vet at Blender er topp, og nå skal vi fortsette å løfte våre hoder opp. For det å kunne skape med fri tilgang til verktøy og material, og deling av kunnskap skape

++++ HEI :) ++++ Dersom du leser dette, har du antageligvis kopiert teksten og limt den inn et annet sted. For å lese teksten bedre kan du benytte "Developer mode" i nettleseren til å deaktivere "font-family: hansgerhard !important" fra CSS. Da vil teksten vises i nettleseren med normal font! ++++++++++++++++

En digital safari innen åpen design er gøy, og nå begynner din erfaring å bli høy. Forhåpentlig vil du etter denne reise se at det å la seg forblinde av kommersielle løsninger er passé. For open source gir så mye mer enn bedre økonomi og mindre strev. Min kjære venn: Kom, bli med!

docs.title: A (8 bokstaver)
docs.text:
"We would not dare to conceive the things which are really mere commonplaces of existence." - Sherlock Holmes, 'A Case Of Identity'.

Du lar deg inspirere av påskekrimmen på TV og vil selv lage film. Du finner et videoredigeringsprogram og er raskt igang.

docs.title: B (4 bokstaver)
docs.text:
You see, but you do not observe. The distinction is clear. - Sherlock Holmes, 'The Sign of Four'

Påskeferie blir herlig en avslutning av prosjektuken. Du brukte et program til å enkelt presentere prosjektet på en leken måte.

docs.title: C (6 bokstaver)
docs.text:
"My mind rebels at stagnation. Give me problems, give me work, give me the most abstruse cryptogram, or the most intricate analysis, and I am in my own proper atmosphere." - Sherlock Holmes, 'The Sign of Four'.

Innleveringen av en kjedelig, akademisk oppgave gjør at du må ta deg bypåske. Du finner heldigvis et program for dataanalyse som lar deg arbeide visuelt og samtidig gi deg assosiasjoner til påskefjellet.

https://aho-opensource.github.io/ahoquiz/ A + B + C

docs.title: Assets
docs.text:
Note

Not all assets here are necessarily completely open source, for example some Creative Common licenses are not allowed for commercial works. See About CC Licenses and tl;drLegal.

docs.title: Openverse
docs.text: Search engine for for CC content on internet, indexing multiple sources.

docs.title: Freesound
docs.text: Creative Commons licensed audio samples (also indexed by Openverse, except NSFW sounds).

docs.text: Search engine for for CC content on internet, indexing multiple sources.

docs.text: Generate different types of data. Install using haskellstack; other languages has also this library (Ruby, C++, JavaScript, python, Go, etc.).

docs.title: Opensource
docs.text: https://www.opensourcealternative.to/ https://github.com/topics/ https://www.tldrlegal.com/ https://creativecommons.org/faq/ (not necessarily open source!) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_free_and_open-source_software_packages

docs.title: Software
docs.text:
Tip

CLI (command line interface) software is most easily installed using your package manager. Homebrew can even install most GUI software for your macOS.

macOSWindowsLinux

Using Terminal:

$ brew search <name>       # look after software 
$ brew install <name>      # install software 
$ brew cask install <name> # install GUI software

See tldr brew for more information.

Using WSL (Ubuntu):

$ apt search <name>         # look after software
$ sudo apt install <name>   # install software

See tldr apt for more information.

pacman/Rosetta

docs.title: Windows Subsystem for Linux
docs.text: Use Linux inside Windows. Works as a package manager for CLI software on Windows. (MSYS2 can also be considered, as an alternative to WSL)

docs.title: FreeCAD
docs.text: Parametric 3D modeller software. Functionality is assumed to increase a lot the following years. Resources

docs.title: FreeCAD BIM
docs.text: FreeCAD workbench for digital architecture modelling. Resources

docs.title: Inkscape
docs.text: Vector graphics editor with bitmap tracing, path effects, filters and generator extensions (QR codes, charts, plots, calendars, etc.). Resources

docs.title: Krita
docs.text: Raster graphics drawing editor with good graphics table support and G'MIC filters.

docs.title: GIMP
docs.text: Raster graphics editor for image manipulation and editing, typically photos.

docs.title: FontForge
docs.text: Font editor software. Can also extract and export fonts from PDF files.

docs.title: Natron
docs.text: Composing software for VFX and motion graphics.

docs.title: EagleAnimation
docs.text: Stop motion animation software with several features, using a wired USB-webcam (or a DSLR camera), typically.

docs.title: FFmpeg
docs.text: CLI to convert video and sound formats.

docs.title: yt-dlp
docs.text: CLI to download videos and audio from internet (YouTube, Vimeo, etc).

docs.title: vcsi
docs.text: CLI with several options to create a grid of thumbnails from video.

docs.title: GitHub Pages
docs.text: A free and easy way to create a homepage using your GitHub account.

docs.title: Jekyll
docs.text: An easy way to create your own website. Works well with GitHub pages.

docs.title: Material for MkDocs
docs.text: A popular theme with several features for MkDocs. Works well with GitHub pages. This site is made using MkDocs and Material.

docs.title: awesome-selfhosted
docs.text: List of self hosting alternatives for web services.

docs.title: Pandoc
docs.text: CLI for converting between text document formats. Makes it easy to create PDF files from Markdown with images, reference system, etc. Templates let you define custom visual styles.

docs.title: LibreOffice
docs.text: Traditional office suite (word processor, spreadsheet, presentation program, database).

docs.title: SponsorBlock
docs.text: Automatically skip the sections with sponsored content in YouTube videos.

docs.title: Creating a portfolio using Github Pages
TODO
docs.text:
Create a guide based on:

  • Fork portfolYOU and create a barebone AHO variant of it (Pintereso and Portfolio Jekyll Theme could be alternatives).
  • Use resources Creating a GitHub Pages site with Jekyll, Adding a theme to your GitHub Pages site using Jekyll and About portfolYOU to compile a guide for AHO.
  • Show how to connect a private domain.
  • Show other open source themes for Jekyll: Jekylltemplates, dr jekyll's themes.
  • Other links: Awesome Jekyll,

docs.title: Awesome Design
docs.text: Curated design resources from all over the world.

docs.title: OpenStreetMap
docs.text: OpenStreetMap is built by a community of mappers that contribute and maintain data about roads, trails, cafés, railway stations, and much more, all over the world.

docs.title: uMap
docs.text: Online map creator. Create your own data on maps provided by OpenStreetMap, such as points, lines, labels, etc. Your maps can easily be embedded in HTML.

docs.title: Learn X in Y minutes
docs.text: Efficient learning by examples of computer topics.
